name: Oily Cicada
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can reduce the Levels of all Insect monsters you currently control by 1. If the battle position of this card is changed: You can Special Summon 1 "Oily Cicada" from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use each effect of "Oily Cicada" once per turn.
